import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/Alert'; import AuthContext from '../../context/auth-context'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import './CreateUserForm.css'; const CreateAppointmentForm = (props) => { const [apptDate, setApptDate] = useState(new Date()); const handleChangeApptDate = date => { setApptDate(date); AuthContext._currentValue.fancyDate = apptDate; console.log(`apptDate ${apptDate}`); } return (
Create an appointment for: {props.selectedPatient.name} Title Type Location Date Today ? {console.log(e.target.checked)}}/> Fancy Appointment Date Scheduled Time Check-in Time Seen Time Description In Progress ? Attended ? Important ? {props.canCancel && ( )} {props.canConfirm && ( )}
)}; export default CreateAppointmentForm;
